plot.content:
Packing triangles recursively on a 70 x 50 cm paper with Molotow blue pen.

The pen is very challenging to work with because you always need to pressure it for the ink to flow properly. I had some glitches in this plot but decided to keep it as is.

prev.content:
A 70x50cm charcoal plot, based on generator "Plottable Slimes" and adapted to A1 size for charcoal usage.

extra params: --seed 175 --r-increment 1 --max-pad-between 2

data.title: Slimes charcoal
data.description: A 70x50cm charcoal plot, based on generator Plottable Slimes and adapted to A1 size for charcoal usage.

next.content:
Polygon packing recursively on a 70 x 50 cm paper with ballpoint blue pen.

This took about 20 hours.
